thread.title: IIDA and Four Seasons to co-present the 2015 Best of Asia Pacific Design Awards
thread.title_full: IIDA and Four Seasons to co-present the 2015 Best of Asia Pacific Design Awards | Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: IIDA and Four Seasons to co-present the 2015 Best of Asia Pacific Design Awards
text:
IIDA and Four Seasons to co-present the 2015 Best of Asia Pacific Design Awards
The International Interior Design Association (IIDA) proudly announces Four Seasons Hotels and Resorts as co-presenting sponsor of the 2015 Best of Asia Pacific Design Awards, an international design competition that honours innovation and design excellence in interior design and architecture throughout the Asia Pacific region.
“IIDA is honoured to partner with Four Seasons as our co-presenting sponsor of the 2015 Best of Asia Pacific Design Awards,” IIDA Executive Vice President and CEO Cheryl Durst, Hon. FIIDA, LEED AP, said. “Throughout the world, Four Seasons is known for its impeccable award-winning design and accommodations of the highest quality. IIDA has recognised Four Seasons as a leader in design, and presented them with the 2012 IIDA Star Award for their outstanding contributions to the interior design profession. They are the ideal partner to co-sponsor the Best of Asia Pacific Design Awards.”
Four Seasons Hotels and Resorts is a proud partner of the competition. “Serving as co-sponsor for the 3rd Annual Best of Asia Pacific Awards represents the ideal synergy for Four Seasons. As we continue to expand our footprint in Asia Pacific with new properties opening in Seoul (2015), Kyoto and Tianjin (2016), the celebration of excellence in design is embodied by each of our distinctive offerings, where our commitment to best-in-class quality and service is unwavering,” said Michael A. Crawford, President Asia Pacific, Four Seasons Hotels and Resorts.
Entries are now being accepted for the 3rd Annual Best of Asia Pacific Design Awards. Winning projects will be chosen by a prestigious international panel, including Annie Chu, IIDA, AIA, of CHU+GOODING Architects; Primo Orpilla, IIDA, of STUDIO O+A; and Joey N. Shimoda, FIIDA, FAIA, of Shimoda Design Group.
Projects must be located in the Asia Pacific region, however the design firm may be based outside of the region. Submitted project(s) must have been completed after January 1, 2013. Deadline for submitting entries is Friday, August 28, 2015.
Source:-Four Seasons Hotels
